LA Boundary Changes

Source: vignettes/boundary-changes.Rmd
boundary-changes.Rmd

LA codes, names and boundaries have changed over time. ukgeog ships with internal datasets that map all changes since 2011. These mini lookups can be accessed directly as shown below. Or the function create_lookup can be used to generate multi-year lookups and within_yr_lookup can be used to generate within year LAD to UTLA lookups.

2012

In April 2012 the local authority codes for St Albans and Welwyn Hatfield were changed.

LAD11CD LAD11NM LAD12CD LAD12NM
E07000100 St Albans E07000240 St Albans
E07000104 Welwyn Hatfield E07000241 Welwyn Hatfield

Source: ONS

2013

LAD12CD LAD12NM LAD13CD LAD13NM
E06000048 Northumberland E06000057 Northumberland
E07000097 East Hertfordshire E07000242 East Hertfordshire
E07000101 Stevenage E07000243 Stevenage
E08000020 Gateshead E08000037 Gateshead

Source: ONS

2018

In April 2018 the local authority district of Shepway was renamed Folkstone and Hyde.

LAD17CD LAD17NM LAD18CD LAD18NM
E07000112 Shepway E07000112 Folkestone and Hythe

2019

LAD18CD LAD18NM LAD19CD LAD19NM
E07000201 Forest Heath E07000245 West Suffolk
E07000204 St Edmundsbury E07000245 West Suffolk
E07000205 Suffolk Coastal E07000244 East Suffolk
E07000206 Waveney E07000244 East Suffolk
E06000028 Bournemouth E06000058 Bournemouth, Christchurch and Poole
E06000029 Poole E06000058 Bournemouth, Christchurch and Poole
E07000048 Christchurch E06000058 Bournemouth, Christchurch and Poole
E07000049 East Dorset E06000059 Dorset
E07000050 North Dorset E06000059 Dorset
E07000051 Purbeck E06000059 Dorset
E07000052 West Dorset E06000059 Dorset
E07000053 Weymouth and Portland E06000059 Dorset

2020

In April 2020, the County of Buckinghamshire and its lower tier districts became one unitary authority.

LAD19CD LAD19NM LAD20CD LAD20NM
E07000004 Aylesbury Vale E06000060 Buckinghamshire
E07000005 Chiltern E06000060 Buckinghamshire
E07000006 South Bucks E06000060 Buckinghamshire
E07000007 Wycombe E06000060 Buckinghamshire
